parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The intermittent failure of the windshield wipers can cause poor visibility, leading to accidents, especially during inclement weather.
symptoms: Windshield wipers stop working
windshield wipers work intermittently
windshield wipers turn on/off by themselves
windshield wipers fail to shut off immediately after switching off
windshield wipers seize while in motion.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the brake pedal can cause extended stopping distances, increasing the risk of accidents and injuries.
symptoms: The brake pedal goes to the floor
the vehicle takes longer to stop
the vehicle stops very slowly
the brake pedal feels soft or spongy
the vehicle chatters when braking.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the front brake rotors can cause the vehicle to vibrate or chatter when braking, leading to reduced braking performance and increased stopping distances, which can increase the risk of accidents and injuries.
symptoms: The vehicle chatters when braking
the front brake rotors need to be replaced
the brake pedal feels soft or spongy.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the rear ABS system can cause the vehicle to lose traction and stability, leading to increased stopping distances and a higher risk of accidents and injuries.
symptoms: The vehicle takes longer to stop
the vehicle stops very slowly
the rear wheels lock up during braking.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The sudden failure of the driver's seatback can cause a loss of vehicle control, increasing the risk of accidents and injuries.
symptoms: The driver's seatback breaks or collapses while driving
the seatback becomes loose or unstable
the seatback moves unexpectedly during normal driving conditions.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the seat track and anchors can cause the seat to slide forward and backward, compromising the driver's control of the vehicle and increasing the risk of accidents and injuries.
symptoms: The seat track or anchors break
the seat becomes loose or unstable
the seat slides forward and backward during normal driving conditions.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The temporary loss of power steering can make it difficult to control the vehicle, especially when starting from a standstill or at low speeds, which can increase the risk of accidents or collisions.
symptoms: The power steering system fails to provide assistance when starting the vehicle
the steering wheel is difficult to turn
the steering wheel feels heavy or stiff
the power steering system fails to provide assistance when driving at low speeds.
